definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: They decided that the establishment of a separate society founded on Nazi principles of genetic purity was the answer.
sentences.chinese: 这答案是建立一纯正的纳粹理想的亚利安社会。

sentences.english: The last one of the pure-blooded vampires of the third generation in far east.
sentences.chinese: 远东最后一个血统纯正的第三代吸血鬼。

sentences.english: He's a full-blooded footballer with fantastic instincts.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名拥有幻想般本能的纯正的足球运动员。

sentences.english: Speakers of Globish often struggle to understand native English.
sentences.chinese: 讲全球语的人往往很难理解纯正的英语。

sentences.english: It is more stable than APM, which considerably widens the potential application of NTM.
sentences.chinese: 纽甜甜味纯正，比阿斯巴甜稳定，因而应用范围更广。

sentences.english: The pure office of poetry is ever to idealize.
sentences.chinese: 诗的纯正功能向来都是理想化地描绘事物。

sentences.english: It is a real natural and healthy food which is convenient to drink for family all the seasons.
sentences.chinese: 品质纯正，食用方便，是理想的四季常饮佳品。

sentences.english: Her mother was a full blood Cherokee Indian.
sentences.chinese: 母亲的母亲是纯正的切罗基印第安血统。

sentences.english: His English was the most American-accented.
sentences.chinese: 他操的是最纯正的美国式英语。

sentences.english: Let us pray for the influx of cults from abroad and believers being led astray.
sentences.chinese: 让我们为中国教会能维持纯正的信仰来祷告。

sentences.english: He speaked fluently though didn't very correct English.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然英语说得不太纯正，但很流利。

sentences.english: It was said that Teacher Zhang graduated from Qinghua University, a typical intellectual image.
sentences.chinese: 据说张老师是清华毕业，纯正的知识分子形象。

sentences.english: Tibetan restaurant can offer you the most pure family style Tibetan meals.
sentences.chinese: 藏式餐厅向您提供最纯正的家庭藏餐。

sentences.english: So you will have the right taste, you have the right performance in the food quality.
sentences.chinese: 你将尝到纯正品质的美味。

sentences.english: Only the pure truth lies  distilled in the words to come.
sentences.chinese: 只有纯正的真理才是永恒的。

sentences.english: Sam is pedigreed Chinese crested dog.
sentences.chinese: 他是一只纯正的中国冠毛犬。

definition: dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
genuine goods at fair prices/(fig.) genuine/real/true
character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
